item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a passionate Java Developer / Cloud Architect with over 10 years of system development experience. Hands-on, a quick learner and I’ve been involved in solving complex technical challenges within an agile team. Clean code and software craftsmanship enthusiast. My recent focus has been on microservice oriented architectures, cloud native applications, DevOps and CI/CD pipelines. I’m also part of the Google Developer Group Cloud London (@gdgcloud) where I help the community hosting activities to improve their skills on GCP products as well as running Kubernetes mentoring.

item.title: Contact
item.description: ask me anything on Twitter reach out to me on Linkedin

item.title: Medium Posts
item.description: How to ssh into your GCE machine without a public IP How to deploy your Cloud Run service using GitHub Actions Artifact Registry: the new way to keep your App artifacts and Docker Images on GCP Managing Kubernetes objects on GKE with Terraform Automating GCP projects creation with Terraform Passing on Google Cloud Architect Exam High productivity working with Kubernetes
